original_title: Tales from the Hollywood Hills: Natica Jackson
overview: In the 1930's an aging film producer and his much younger wife live separate lives. Whenever a young starlet catches the husband's eye, he eventually manipulates her onto his casting couch. Natica Jackson (Michelle Pfeiffer) is a Hollywood star who is far from innocent, but she finds herself falling in love with a married man who has several children.
title: Tales from the Hollywood Hills: Natica Jackson
